scene: Teen Byte waking up on a Sunday morning, transitioning from the cozy bed back to the desk setup with warm morning light streaming through the Chicago window

subjects.description: Teen Byte, cyan-blue gangly blob with long limbs and big expressive eyes, awake and alert
subjects.position: sitting at the wooden desk in center foreground
subjects.action: rubbing eyes awake, just sat down at the laptop, looking ready to start the day

subjects.description: Wooden desk with oversized silver laptop open and humming, Chicago skyline visible through window behind
subjects.position: center of room with window to the left showing morning city view
subjects.action: static workspace setup restored for morning coding

subjects.description: Wall-mounted trophy shelf above desk with gold 10-day streak trophy on left and green succulent plant on right
subjects.position: mounted on wall directly above the desk

subjects.description: Food bowl with kibble on the floor to the right of the desk
subjects.action: sitting ready for when hunger strikes

style: pixel art, clean 2D forms, dithered shading, readable silhouette, soft morning gradients
lighting: warm golden-pink morning sunlight streaming through the Chicago window, soft ambient glow filling the room
mood: peaceful Sunday morning awakening, content and rested after good sleep
background: simple room with plain walls, large window showing Chicago skyline in morning light, clean uncluttered space
composition: Byte centered at desk, trophy shelf above, food bowl on floor to the right, balanced framing with window providing natural morning light
